Added_Other.mechanism: Introduces a carousel feature for displaying recommended games in the Lua app.
Added_Other.purpose: Players can easily browse and discover new games that are tailored to their interests.

Added_Other.mechanism: Displays age ratings when hovering over game tiles in the app.
Added_Other.purpose: Informs players about age appropriateness before playing a game.

Added_Other.name: FFlagLuaAppSupportEmptyStringFooterMetadata
Added_Other.mechanism: Allows Lua applications to handle empty string metadata in the footer.
Added_Other.purpose: Enhances compatibility and stability of Lua scripts for developers.

Added_Other.name: FFlagLuauOccursCheckInCommit
Added_Other.mechanism: Enhances the Luau scripting engine to check for specific occurrences during code commits.
Added_Other.purpose: Helps developers catch errors early, leading to smoother gameplay experiences for players.

Added_Other.name: FFlagLuauRefineDistributesOverUnions
Added_Other.mechanism: Improves type checking in the Luau programming language for union types.
Added_Other.purpose: Allows developers to write safer and more reliable code, leading to fewer bugs in games.

Added_Other.name: FFlagMigrateEmptyResultsViewToFoundation
Added_Other.mechanism: Updates the display of empty search results to use a new design system.
Added_Other.purpose: Provides a cleaner and more user-friendly interface when no search results are found.

Added_Other.name: FFlagOnlyVisibleFramesAllowModal
Added_Other.mechanism: Restricts modal windows to only appear on visible frames.
Added_Other.purpose: Improves user experience by preventing modals from appearing in areas that players can't see.

Added_Other.name: FFlagPassTextAlignmentRelevancyInfo_Staged
Added_Other.mechanism: Allows text alignment settings to be passed through the system for better layout handling.
Added_Other.purpose: Ensures text is displayed correctly and consistently, enhancing readability.

Added_Other.name: FFlagPerfDataOnTelemetryV2

Added_Other.purpose: Enhances game performance monitoring, leading to smoother gameplay experiences.

Added_Other.name: FFlagPerformanceTelemetryHandleSpuriousWake

Added_Other.purpose: Helps the game run smoother by providing more accurate performance metrics.

Added_Other.name: FFlagPlaceVersionHistoryMetadataRCC_Staged

Added_Other.purpose: Allows players to see and revert to previous versions of a game.

Added_Other.name: FFlagReCacheIconsOnThemeChange
Added_Other.mechanism: Refreshes icon caches when the theme of the game changes.
Added_Other.purpose: Ensures that players see the correct icons that match the current game theme.

Added_Other.name: FFlagRefactorIsTopBarFocused
Added_Other.mechanism: Changes how the top bar focus is managed in the interface.
Added_Other.purpose: Enhances navigation by making it easier for players to interact with the top bar.

Added_Other.name: FFlagRemoveLeaveShortcutFromLeaveConfirm
Added_Other.mechanism: Removes a shortcut option from the leave confirmation dialog.
Added_Other.purpose: Prevents accidental game exits by simplifying the leave confirmation process.

Added_Other.name: FFlagRemoveRespawnShortcutFromRespawnConfirmation

Added_Other.purpose: Players will have to confirm their respawn choice, adding a layer of decision-making.

Added_Other.name: FFlagReverbAbsorptionField
